options_StopUpdates.message: Clear window titles and prevent further updates

options_MinTime.message: Minimum time between window title updates:

options_AllowInPrivateWindows.message: Don't count tabs in private windows.

options_DontSetWindowTitleInPrivateWindo.message: Don't set title's for private windows.

options_NewTabNoTitleWorkaround_Header.message: Workaround for no title in new tab pages

options_NewTabNoTitleWorkaround_Permissi.message: Note: this feature requires the "tabs" permission to function.

options_NewTabNoTitleWorkaround_Enabled.message: Workaround for no title in new tab pages. Firefox's new tab page starts without a title but has one after its reloaded. The title doesn't appear immediately after the tab is reloaded however, instead it appears after the window title preface is set. This option automatically reloads all new tab pages when they are created and then sets the window preface so that new tab pages allways have a title.

options_NewTabNoTitleWorkaround_LoadWait.message: Time to wait before reloading new tab page:

options_NewTabNoTitleWorkaround_MinPrefi.message: Minimum time to wait after reloading new tab page before setting window preface:

options_NewTabNoTitleWorkaround_ReloadWa.message: Maximum time to wait after reloading new tab page before setting window preface (title preface will be set before this time if the tab completes loading during the waiting period):

options_FormatPlaceholders_TabCount.message: $placeholder$: Number of tabs in the current window.

options_FormatPlaceholders_TotalTabCount.message: $placeholder$: Total number of tabs in all windows.

options_FormatPlaceholders_WindowName.message: $placeholder$: A window specific name specified by the user via the extension's toolbar button.

options_FormatPlaceholders_Count.message: $placeholder$: An intiger, starts as 1 and increments until the window's prefix is unique.

options_WindowData_DefaultWindowName.message: Default window name (this name is set to opened windows):

options_WindowData_InheritWindowName.message: Inherit window name. If a window has focus when another window is opened then the new window's name is copied from the focused window.

options_WindowData_InheritWindowSettings.message: Inherit window settings. If a window has focus when another window is opened then the new window's settings are copied from the focused window.

options_WindowData_ApplyDefaultName_Butt.message: Reset all window names to the default name

options_WindowData_ApplyDefaultName_Warn.message: Change all window names to the default name?

options_OptionalPermissions_BrowserActio.message: You need to press on the extension's button in the browser's toolbar to request the permission. Press anywhere else in the settings page to cancel the request.

options_OptionalPermissions_Tabs_Explana.message:
The "tabs" permission is needed to access a tab's title or URL. 

This is needed by the workaround for no title in new tab pages since it needs to know if the opened tab has the "about:newtab" URL.
